Webinar

Getting the Most from Clio: How Practice Management Helps Your Law Firm

Thursday, March 24th, 2016 - 11AM PT | 2PM ET

Deadlines, Trust Management, and Client Communications - How to avoid malpractice with Clio.

As a qualified attorney, you possess the drive and skills to run a successful firm in a competitive industry. With an increasing number of demands and unbillable hours spent on administrative tasks, lawyers are put at constant risk of committing malpractice errors. This takes away from the enjoyment, ease and satisfaction of practicing law.

Register to watch

In this exclusive, hour-long Clio webinar, we invite you to discover the benefits of a legal practice management solution, and how the unique ethical and feature benefits of Clio can streamline your entire practice.

Join us as we discuss:

  • The three common legal malpractice errors facing lawyers and how Clio can eliminate them.
  • How Clio gives your clients the tools to help you on their cases.
  • Clioâ€™s accounting, marketing, administrative and case management tools.
  • The legal tools and ecosystem made available at a discount, arranged exclusively by your Bar Association.
